scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Contains mostly bills and receipts, with a few advertisements and an occasional letter, and one folder of commodity price lists. Receipts in this collection document the business between small town merchant W. E. Long and the commission merchants in Richmond, VA, Washington, D.C., Baltimore, MD and Philadelphia, PA that he supplied with butter, chickens, and eggs. Bills document the variety of merchandise including shoes, fabric, sugar and coffee that Long purchased to supply his own customers.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series 1: Bills and Receipts, 1877-1929, Folders 1-6. Series 2: Price lists, 1880-1924, Folder 7.
